meanings.definition: A person who fields, especially in baseball or cricket.
meanings.sent1: The fielders caught the ball during the baseball game.
meanings.sent2: The cricket team had skilled fielders positioned strategically on the field.
meanings.sent3: The fielders joked about who could catch the most balls during practice.
meanings.sent4: In the game of life, we are all fielders, ready to catch whatever comes our way.
meanings.sent5: The young fielders were eager to show off their abilities in the upcoming match.
